html:
2025-0921
2025-12-11ECCC, HCCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999Prohibition of Certain Toxic Substances Regulations, 2025 Prohibition of Certain Toxic Substances Regulations, 2025 in order to (1) repeal and replace the Prohibition of Certain Toxic Substances Regulations, 2012; (2) restrict the manufacture, use, sale and import of Dechlorane Plus and decabromodiphenyl ethane, and products containing these substances; (3) further restrict the manufacture, use, sale and import of perfluorooctane sulfonate (PFOS), perfluorooctanoic acid (PFOA), perfluorocarboxylic acids (LC-PFCAs), hexabromocyclododecane (HBCD) and polybrominated diphenyl ethers (PBDEs), and products containing these substances; and (4) exempt the transit through Canada of a manufactured item containing a prohibited toxic substance. .Registration: SOR/2025-0270 Publication Date: 2025-12-31
subject: Prohibition of Certain Toxic Substances Regulations, 2025
precis: Prohibition of Certain Toxic Substances Regulations, 2025 in order to (1) repeal and replace the Prohibition of Certain Toxic Substances Regulations, 2012; (2) restrict the manufacture, use, sale and import of Dechlorane Plus and decabromodiphenyl ethane, and products containing these substances; (3) further restrict the manufacture, use, sale and import of perfluorooctane sulfonate (PFOS), perfluorooctanoic acid (PFOA), perfluorocarboxylic acids (LC-PFCAs), hexabromocyclododecane (HBCD) and polybrominated diphenyl ethers (PBDEs), and products containing these substances; and (4) exempt the transit through Canada of a manufactured item containing a prohibited toxic substance. .
